item.description:
I am so glad to see so much interest in bowling and dinner.  To hold this event at kings and accommodate everyone would end up costing over $60 per person. The good news is we have another great alternative at PINZ in Milford. I have been there and it’s a fun place.

I really like this option as it gives us a lot more flexibility for a great casual social evening for people to mingle, bowl, have food, beverages and lots of laughing.

We will hold four lanes for three hours.  We need a minimum of 30 people to each pay $12 which includes the four lanes, space to hang, bowling unlimited strings and the PayPal fee.  Shoes are $4.20 per person if you want to bowl.

Each person can choose to order food, and pay individually, that will be delivered to the lanes.

To reserve he lanes, I will need a commitment of people going.  Please make a payment by Friday so that I can confirm the lanes.

If the event fills up then once we have an additional 6 people I will reserve another lane.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Barbara at Bowling check in desk

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Dinner and Bowling
